name: 劉玉蓀
objective: 機率空間；離散及連續隨機變數；期望值，變異數，及特徵函數；聯合分佈隨機變數；大數法則及中央極限定理。
schedule:
(1) Axioms of Probability (1 week)
(2) Conditional Probability and Independence (0.5 weeks)
(3) Random Variables (4 weeks)
(4) Special Discrete and Continuous Distributions (2 weeks)
(5) Two Random Variables  (2 weeks)
(6) Sums of Independent Random Variables and Limit Theorems   (2 weeks)
materials:
Probability & Statistics for Engineers and Scientists (9th edition) by Walpole et al.
或 
上面英文書的中譯中文版：機率與統計 [精華版]   譯者 陳常侃 等 
(高立)
